nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 55, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. West southwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Sunny
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7am. Mostly sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Clear then Slight Chance Rain Showers
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 5am. Mostly clear. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 5pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 65. South wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. West southwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 64. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 11pm and 2am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. South southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Friday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Sunny
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 11am. Sunny, with a high near 66. West southwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 45. North wind 5 to 10 mph.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 73. Northeast wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. North northeast wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 81. East northeast wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. East northeast wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 84. East southeast wind around 5 mph.
